mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "A Most Unusual Square Dance", "Ramblin' Rose Hall", "Square Dance Mobile Home Parks - 1985", "The Sumatra Swingers", "Hornet's Nest Recording Studios", "Sweepstakes, 1985", "Velkommen til Square Dance", "Refreshment Time", "A Distinctive Sound", "Losing Perspective", "Scholarship Awards", "Amadeus", "34th National Square Dance Convention", and "Square Dance Date Book." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "The Changing Scene", "Traditional Treasury", "Advanced Dancing", "Contra Corner", "Mostly Modular", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Experimental Notes", "Ladies on the Square", "StyleLab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month" and "Current Releases."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
